name: Gen AI-Powered Account Receivables Automation
description: Transformed account receivables management using Gen AI-powered Cognitive Process Automation, managing commission collections across 1,000+ hotels in 30+ countries, recovering aged receivables worth millions.
challenge: Manual receivables processing with aged receivables of $4-5M, only 27-32% collection rate, team of 10 handling 4,200-5,500 emails and 2,600-3,200 calls monthly, leading to delayed revenue recognition and ineffective communication.
solution: Implemented Gen AI-powered Cognitive Process Automation
Deployed NLU for intelligent inquiry interpretation and response
Created AI agents for contact detail validation and updates
Developed automated email drafting and follow-up system
outcomes: 15-20% increase in recovery rates improving cash flow
Eliminated manual errors and delayed follow-ups
